mapper.select: select r.role from users u join users_roles ur on ur.user_id = u.userId join roles r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.userName = #{userName};
select r.description from users u join users_roles ur on ur.user_id = u.userId join roles r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.userName = #{userName};

select p.permission from users u join users_roles ur on ur.user_id = u.userId join roles r on ur.role_id = r.id join roles_permissions rp on r.id = rp.role_id join permissions p on p.id = rp.permission_id where u.userName = #{userName};
select cl.cusLevelId,cl.levelName,cl.levelDiscount from users join customer c on users.userId = c.userId join cuslevel cl on c.cusLevelId = cl.cusLevelId where users.userName = #{userName};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(userName, password, salt, email, phoneNumber, registerDate, birthday) VALUES (#{userName},#{password},#{salt}, #{email},#{phoneNumber},#{registerDate},#{birthday});
insert into users_roles values (null,#{userId},(select id from roles where role=#{roleName}))
mapper.update:

userName = #{userName},
password = #{password},
salt = #{salt},
email = #{email},
phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber},
registerDate = #{registerDate},
birthday = #{birthday},
WHERE userId = #{userId};
